channel.title: Data Grid Conversions > Converting the Stock Program 2 : Recent Lessons
channel.description: Recently created lessons from Data Grid Conversions : Converting the Stock Program 2

item.title: Customize Column Templates
item.description: Now that you have created and configured the data grid table you can customize any columns that need to display data in a special way.

item.title: Create the Data Grid Table
item.description: We will begin by creating a data grid table and configuring it.

item.title: Original UI
item.description:
These lessons you will show you how Karen Hughes' stock program was converted to use the data grid.

This is what the original UI looks like. We are going to convert the the list of stocks from a field to a data grid table.
